name: It's Comming (VimJam Version)
description:
A short Horror Inspired game where nothing goes where it should and you need to collect all the notes and artifacts.

fun fact, for those willing to explore, you are able to visit the title screen. good luck exploring. 

this game's ending wasn't programmed in time therefor, it will remain incomplete until the rating time of the jam is over in which if people enjoy this prototype I will continue building this idea into a full game.
